Articles.Content: This is the next aircraft I am working on, still needs a bit of work on stability (mainly pitch) also it cannot be kept level at altitude with sas at the moment, unlike the AT-700 which can be kept level with sas on and making slight adjustments. If anyone has any tips for improving the aircraft please let me know as i would like to be able to build bigger but the bigger I build the less (that looks like it should fly) works. Also it should be able to fly about 1000km or a bit more but I have not tested the range yet.
Forgot to put the craft in here.
